Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
FunctionListener, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, Gui
public abstract class ClientGameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, FunctionListener
Abstract Class that represents the Controller client side that handle all the logic functions, extended by both CLI and GUI
Since:
2020/06/20

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientGameController()
    Public constructor for the Client Game Controller, start the thread that run the functions added to the queue, and load configuration parameters

    • run

      public void run()
      Thread that run all the functions that it finds on the eventQueue

    • openConnection

      public void openConnection​(java.lang.String name, int numberOfPlayer, java.lang.String address, int port) throws java.net.ConnectException
      Function that open the connection with the server, sending game configuration parameters
      Parameters:
      name - Nickname inserted by the Client
      numberOfPlayer - Number of Player Selected by the Client(2/3)
      address - IP address of the Server
      port - Port used by the Server
      Throws:
      java.net.ConnectException - ConnectException wrong parameters

    • newGame

      public void newGame​(java.lang.String nickName, int numberOfPlayer)
      Function that handle the "back" command, send to the Server the new nickname and new number of player
      Parameters:
      nickName - The new Nickname selected by the Client
      numberOfPlayer - New number of player selected by the Client
